item.description:
*N*O*T*E*      *N*O*T*E*    *N*O*T*E*    *N*O*T*E*    *N*O*T*E*    *N*O*T*E*

With the very low participation in the last six months, and the pending closing of Angelina's in July, I will have to close cribbage in Waltham, unless we start getting MORE participation:( In case anyone is interested, it does cost money to run these events at a cost of $150/year.   I *LU*V* cribbage and would like to keep it going!!   AGAIN I need people in attendance or else it will not be a happening event.

item.why: *N*O*T*E* *N*O*T*E* *N*O*T*E* *NO*T*E* With the very low participation in the last six months, and the pending closing of Angelina's in July, I will have to close cribbage in Waltham, unless we start getting MORE participation :(
item.name: Waltham Cribbage MeetUp: May Flowers!!! NEED YOU :)
